entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ReadAtLeastAsync cancellation is broken #69649
  • ArrayPool does not resize based on user request #69641
  • [wasm][debugger] Support complex expressions with null-condition #69640
  • wasm][debugger] Refactor evaluateOnCallFrame #69639
  • [API Proposal]: More helper methods for exception types #69637
  • CORINFO_HELP_READYTORUN_STATIC_BASE is emitted twice in some cases #69635

Closed

  • NetworkStream blocks on CopyTo from it #69650
  • Generics return type with explicit layout in PInvoke #37198
    Future
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\NETClients\\Primitives\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC\\NETClientPrimitivesInALC.cmd #68880
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to expose existing runtime EventCounter data #65989
    7.0.0
  • CoClass doesn't mix well with default interface implementations #46993
    7.0.0
  • HWIntrinsics: FMA suboptimal codegen #12212
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Exposing `Radix` and the remaining `Is*` generic-math APIs #69651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rename and reenable test #69648
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Reenable tests to see if 63746 is fixed. #69646
  • Bump LLVM to 14.x. #69645
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix Create/StartActivity parentId nullability #69636
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Style improvements for generated p/invokes #69638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Profiler RequestReJITWithInliners did not work properly if all methods in the module were not loaded #69634
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move dead code removal in lower after last updategraph #69421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IsSupported guard check for use of Ssse3.Shuffle in Span.Reverse #69623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SystemNative_SendFile on iOS/tvOS devices #69436
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Updating to a version of Roslyn that contains the NumericIntPtr feature #69627
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Draft Optimization for "~x + 1" to "-x" (#69003) #69600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
